Package com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector

Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading sentence splits from a training corpus.
    SentenceProcessor
    Any class that can process sentences found by a sentence detector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreemarkerSentenceWriter
    Processes sentence detector output by writing via a freemarker template.
    Will use the template specified in talismane.core.[sessionId].sentence-detector.output.template if provided, otherwise the default sentence_template.ftl.
    If no writer is specified, will write to a file with the suffix "_sent.txt".
    PossibleSentenceBoundary  
    SentenceBoundary
    A marker for annotating sentences in a text, with the annotation spanning the full sentence.
    SentenceDetector
    Detects sentence boundaries within an annotated text.
    SentenceDetectorEvaluator
    An interface for evaluating a given sentence detector.
    SentenceDetectorEventStream
    An event stream for sentence detector training/evaluation.
    SentenceDetectorTrainer
    Reads various configuration parameters and trains a sentence-detector model.
    SentencePerLineCorpusReader
    A default corpus reader which assumes one sentence per line.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SentenceDetectorOutcome  

Package com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector Description

Training and evaluation for sentence detectors. The main interface is SentenceDetector.
